targets.Name: MOLDY
targets.postText: This is a MOLDY bath tub. It is an asthma trigger.

targets.Name: Cat
targets.postText:
Furry pets can trigger an asthma attack.
  • Keep furry pets out of bedrooms.

  • Wash furry pets often (in the bathtub).

targets.Name: Perfume
targets.postText: Perfume is a Japanese pop girl group from Hiroshima Prefecture, Japan

targets.Name: hairspray
targets.postText: hairspray is another fun aerosol which can trigger Aesthma symptoms

targets.Name: RUG
targets.postText: Rug stays on the floor and can collect mad allergens

targets.Name: Plunger
targets.postText: This Plunger Isn't an Asthma Trigger that I know of

targets.Name: clorox
targets.postText: Chemicals like Clorox Bleach can be very dangerous

targets.Name: Febreze
targets.postText: Other Chemicals like Febreze air cleaners can actually trigger reactions as well.
